concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: My name is Archibald Jefferson King. Would you like to hear my story?

concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: My dad died in the Golden War

concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: My ma died during child birth

concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: I spent my earliest years in an orphanage

concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: Vincent, another orphan, beat me up every day

concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: Vincent set the orphanage on fire and blamed me

concepts.name: My Story
concepts.speech: I got kicked out and have been on the streets ever since

concepts.name: Polite
concepts.speech: Hello! D'you have any spare coins?

concepts.name: Polite
concepts.speech: G'day! Could you spare a dime?

concepts.name: Polite
concepts.speech: My name is Archibald. D'you have any change for a meal?

concepts.name: Polite
concepts.speech: Hiya! Any chance you could spare some money for a sandwich?
